GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
ipv4: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fib_multipath_use_neigh.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit b8d345db03b4deffb4f04219a51d3b1e94171b76, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit a6db4494d218c2e559173661ee972e048dc04fdd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipv4: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fib_multipath_use_neigh.
